torso.transformationDescription:
After just a few moments, the transformation comes to an end, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(let)] out a deep sigh as the itching finally stops, leaving [npc.her] torso covered with mouse-like fur. [npc.Her] new, close-cropped fur follows the lines of [npc.her] figure and is very smooth and soft.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldMouse(mouse-like)], [npc.skinFullDescription].
